name: Atropa
description:
Made for Crimson Jam: Retro. It's intended as a sort of "spiritual successor" to Undertale, although the gameplay doesn't resemble Undertale much at all--it's a successor more in theme.

If you're upset by intentional visual glitches, please go into the settings and toggle "Miku Mode."

Credits:
Ocean's Nostalgia - Music, art
SumRndmDde - Plugin
Olivia - Plugins
Yanfly - Plugins
mjshi - Plugins
